content.html: Google has confirmed to us the presence of a bug that crashes Google Docs as soon as you type... "And. And. And. And. And." into the doc and refresh. There's no way left then to easily re-access the doc as the crash would trigger as soon as you reopen it. bleepingcomputer.com/news/technolog…
content.value:
Google has confirmed to us the presence of a bug that crashes Google Docs as soon as you type... "And. And. And. And. And." into the doc and refresh.

There's no way left then to easily re-access the doc as the crash would trigger as soon as you reopen it.
bleepingcomputer.com/news/technolog…
